titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at VVhite-Hall, on the 28. of April, 1622. By Walter Curll, D. in Diuinity and deane of Lichfield. Published by speciall command
titleStmt.author: Curll, Walter, 1575-1647.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" and a woodcut frame.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
